嶰嶰嶰

嶰字的基本解释

嶰
xiè
山涧；沟壑（有水称涧，无水称嶰）：“穷浚谷，底幽嶰。”

嶰
jiè
山名。

嶰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》胡買切，上蟹，匣。］
山涧。

嶰字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶰； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页320第38
【廣韻】胡買切【集韻】下買切，?音蟹。山澗閒也。【左思·吳都賦】嶰澗閴岡。【註】小山別大山曰嶰。　又谷名。【通鑑綱目】黃帝命伶倫取竹於嶰溪之谷。　又通作解。【前漢·律歷志】黃帝使泠綸取竹之解谷。【註】孟康曰：解，脫也。谷，竹溝也。取竹之脫無鉤節者。一說昆侖之北谷名也。　又去聲。【集韻】居隘切，音懈。義同。　又叶虛里切，音喜。【馬融·廣成頌】冒?柘搓?枳，窮浚谷底幽嶰。

嶰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嶰字的起名意思

指山涧，沟壑，也指山名。

mountain valley
Basic explanation of words
mountain valley
xiè
Mountain stream; gully (with water called stream, no water called 嶰): "Poor dredging valley, quiet bottom."
mountain valley
jiè
Mountain name.
mountain valley
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guang Yun" Hu Mai cut, crab, box. ]
Mountain stream.
mountain valley
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶰; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 320 Page 38
[Guang Yun] Hu Maiqie [Jiyun] Buy and cut it underneath, it is sound crab. The mountain stream is also free. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Jianjian Chenggang. [Note] The small mountain is not the big mountain.　Also the name of the valley. [Tongjian Compendium] Huangdi ordered Linglun to take bamboo in the valley of Shixi River.　It's an explanation again. [Previous Han·Lüzhi] The Yellow Emperor made Linglun take the bamboo solution valley. [Note] Meng Kang said: Relief is also free. Valley, Zhugou also. Those who take bamboo without unhooked knots. One talk about the name of North Valley in Kunlun.　Go again. [Jiyun] The home is cut, and the sound is lax. The same meaning.　 Ye Xuli cut again, Yinxi. [Ma Rong·Song of Guangcheng] Take a chance to rub a bitter orange, the bottom of the valley is secluded.
mountain valley

Refers to mountain streams, ravines, and mountain names.
xiè
сущ. горная долина; теснина; ущелье
